abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Ambusher: If it attacks a Being that has not acted in the Combat, it deals an extra die of damage. Statblocks // Cryptids Statblocks // Cryptids 135 135 Bestiary Bulette TL: 10.9 Large Cryptid Armored land sharks that rip through the earth. HD: 9 (40 HP) Speed: 40' Zone: Frontline Morale: 7 # Appearing: d2 Senses: Seismicsense (Far) Armor: 4 [as (+1) Plate] ACTIONS Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite Bite [Melee Attack]: 26 (4d12) Claw [Melee Attack]: 10 (3d6) ABILITIES Soft Underbelly: Its Armor is 0 while it is Prone.
